common.noMatches: Ga go na tse di tshwanelang

profile.title: Profaili ya Modirisi
profile.mustLogin: O tshwanetse go tsena go bona ditlhophiso.
profile.showOriginalWithTranslation: Bontsha melaetsa ya ntlha le e e ranotsweng
profile.saveError: Phoso: Ga e a kgona go boloka ditlhophiso
profile.noPrivateKey: Ga go na senotlolo sa sephiri mo sedirisweng seno sa go romela.
profile.backupDownloaded: Bekapo e e sireleditsweng e kopolotswe.
profile.importSuccess: Senotlolo sa sephiri se tsentswe mo sedirisweng seno.
profile.importFailed: Go paletswe go tsenya senotlolo (khunololamoraba e phoso kgotsa faele e senyegile).
profile.keysRotated: Senotlolo se sesha se tlhamiwe mme sa romelwa kwa godimo.
profile.importKey: Tsenya bekapo e e sireleditsweng ya senotlolo
profile.keyDisclaimer: Senotlolo sa gago sa sephiri ga se tswe mo sedirisweng seno. Romela kopi e e sireleditsweng ka khunololamoraba go e busetsa mo sedirisweng se sengwe.
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Fetisetsa mehala le melaetsa e e tsenang kwa mogaleng kgotsa email e e netefaditsweng. Mehala/melaetsa e e tswang e ka bontsha nomoro ya gago ya Chatforia.

chat.selectPrompt: Tlhopha molaetsa kgotsa phaposi ya puisano go simolola go bua
